normalized: men armed to the teeth stood by in the corridor.
one gave the signal to blow the explosives on the hinges and lock of the door.
together with an explosion, the door flew inwards.
the soldiers stepped inside amidst the rising dust.
they were being prudent.
the safety locks were off on their guns and they had their fingers steadily on the triggers.
they slowly made their way inside while taking a posture so that they could fire at a moment's notice.
they were a ryuumon assassination unit.
and they weren't merely an assassination unit.
they were wearing goggles and lightweight bulletproof vests.
they even had sub-machine guns that any country's marine corps would have in active service.
they were a completely trained combat group.
the chinese union wouldn't be able to mobilize such a force because of international opinion, and the superior grade of their equipment wasn't chinese-made.
normally, line troops weren't expected to be here.
the commanding officer signaled with his fingers and the soldiers, in compliance with that, surged forward to investigate the kitchen and restroom.
their targets could not be found in the room spilling with light from the setting sun.
i wondered why they were slowing up.
they asked a person on guard duty if there was any evidence that we had gone out of the room.
which meant, they had also known that taimanin were their targets.
they did not intend on negligence.
negligence would result in death no matter who you were.
their knowledge of ninja was almost like that of an old b-movie fabricated by hollywood.
were they expecting us to come running at them brandishing feudalistic swords?
they were fine with the idea of shooting us down before we could kill them with our swords.
the trained soldiers were hellbent on the idea that ninja and the like were their enemies.
one soldier noticed the mini-computer sitting on the chest.
the power was on and a man could be seen on the monitor screen.

name: kurou
normalized: yo!
are you there asagi?
i'm going to be about an hour late getting there
the soldier peered into the monitor, still brandishing his gun.

name: kurou
normalized: haha, you've come to deal with the captain, right?

name: kurou
normalized: that's right, you.
i'm talking to the commanding officer and all of you.
you're all about to get fucked.
in about 3 seconds
the soldiers all at once glanced towards the window.

name: kurou
normalized: …2 seconds
the windowpane smashed open and two figures could be seen jumping out.
they immediately tried pulling their triggers.

name: kurou
normalized: time's up
a flash of light filled my field of vision.
the soldiers that had raided the room or were holding back in the corridor were engulfed by the light.
i felt a hot wind on my back from the explosion behind me.
the bomb that had been activated in the computer to preserve the secret information had not just blown up the room, but should have destroyed the corridors as well.

name: sakura
normalized: hahh--!
sakura, jumping out with me, was adjusting her posture in mid-air.
i was dropping in front of her into the alleyway from the hiding place four stories up.
while i surrendered myself to the gravity, i made sure there wasn't a detachment force waiting for us on the ground.

name: asagi
normalized: （that must've been--all of them）
it seemed unlikely that that was going to rile up the bees' nest the instant we made it to the ground.

name: asagi
normalized: （that should have killed all of the intruders--）
whether or not it was an induced explosion from grenades the soldiers were carrying, an even more violent explosion went off behind me.
crimson flames and black smoke began rising up into the sky.
the ground drew nearer before my eyes.

name: asagi
normalized: haa--
i loosened up the muscles in my body so that i could absorb the impact of the fall.
the joints in my knees bent as they dispersed the impact the moment i landed onto the ground.

name: sakura
normalized: to--
sakura had landed in the same way as well.

name: asagi
normalized: are you all right, sakura?

name: sakura
normalized: yeah, i'm cool
these kinds of heights were child's play for taimanin.

name: sakura
normalized: but, this look is definitely much more fitting
sakura clad in her ninja costume laughed lightly.

name: asagi
normalized: now's not the time for small talk.
we have one hour to get to the bridge, sakura

name: sakura
normalized: yeah, i know.
i heard!
a loud thunderous sound made the building shake.
parts of the soldiers bodies were amidst the splinters of glass and pieces of concrete scattering around.
people were coming out from around the buildings as they caught sound of the explosions.
it looked like they were just people who lived in the vicinity of the building.

name: man
normalized: h, hey, what's going on.
hey?

name: man
normalized: where are those idiots?
what exploded, gas?
curious onlookers were gathering and began to naturally turn their attention to the two in ninja outfits.

name: asagi
normalized: let's go, sakura

name: sakura
normalized: yeah--
without making a sound, we burst through the gaps in the crowd that had gathered.

name: man
normalized: …nn?

name: woman
normalized: what the?
cosplay?
disregarding the strange looks from the onlookers, i began heading to the bridge at once.
my body instinctively reacted.
i stopped suddenly and stared at him.

name: sakura
normalized: onee-chan!

name: asagi
normalized: --i know
the murderous scent i sensed on my so called enemy was not unknown to me.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: …foolish humans.
i'm putting an end to your little killing show, escape will not be so easy
a bizarre unearthliness exuded from his gigantic form clad in full armor.
he scowled at us with a pair of eyes that were different from any human's.

name: asagi
normalized: a demon, is it…what a bothersome bunch
demons varied in power, from the "ogres" who ate humans to the lesser demon "goblin" variety.
it was really just the lower variety that had come out to meddle in the world of humans.

name: man
normalized: hey, what's going on…

name: man
normalized: what are they planning on doing…
the curious onlookers who were mostly preoccupied with the explosion, began focusing their attention to us.
i hadn't sensed anything up until just now.
his existence had manipulated my senses in the same way that little girl had.
there was no mistaking that this was an advanced level of demon standing before me.
i've heard rumors and folklore of demons so powerful that they could manipulate the heavens and the earth.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: my name is sokushitsuki.
taimanin asagi, that is a name that echoes even in the pits of hell

name: asagi
normalized: that is flattering to hear--

name: asagi
normalized: （sokushitsuki--, if i recall, that's a hindu demon called "rakshasa", isn't it）
there are heavenly rakshasa in buddhism, but there are also demonic rakshasa.
8 of the heavenly rakshasa are counted among the 12 heavenly ones who protect against destruction and ruin.
many of them have two fingers on their left hand and hold swords in their right and ride white lions in full armor.
but, the monster standing before me was far from being anything like that.
i didn't feel a divine presence of a heavenly rakshasa either.
this one exuded an overwhelming unearthliness and murderous scent.

name: asagi
normalized: sakura, go on ahead of me!
i'll try to meet up with you at the gate
i shot out a warning to my partner on instinct.
maybe i thought sakura was becoming a burden.

name: asagi
normalized: （…if worst came to worst, at least sakura would have escaped）

name: sakura
normalized: onee-chann…!

name: asagi
normalized: it's all right, i won't lose

name: sakura
normalized: but--

name: asagi
normalized: obey your commanding officer!

name: asagi
normalized: do as i said, hurry up!
sakura hesitated just for a moment.

name: sakura
normalized: …understood, captain
although it looked like she wanted to say more, she departed at once.
i was on the lookout for sokushitsuki to chase after sakura, but the demon did not move.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: are you satisfied now?

name: asagi
normalized: ehh…

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: does that girl at your side make you so uneasy that you can not fight in earnest?

name: asagi
normalized: …you speak like you know everything, huh

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: i just know how sweet the things you call humans are

name: asagi
normalized: i just want to know one thing

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: what?

name: asagi
normalized: did you kill the three taimanin…?

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: no.
with the exception of the powerful, nothing interests me

name: asagi
normalized: （…what the hell is this guy doing here then）

name: asagi
normalized: to what extent are you involved in the human conspiracies going on here?

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: one thing, does it matter?

name: asagi
normalized: if you don't want to answer my question, then that's fine
the demon's mouth curled indistinctly in a sneer.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: guku…we are kindred souls

name: asagi
normalized: kindred souls?

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: too many words.
all along i have sensed your interest in a fight
the demon's fighting spirit swelled at once.

name: asagi
normalized: （this guy is still--）
in other words, even normal people could sense the maliciousness exuding from him.

name: man
normalized: h, hey, i'm not staying around…

name: man
normalized: ah, ahh…
the residents that had come from the explosion, were affected by that maliciousness and returned back inside of their buildings.
let sleeping dogs lie was their motto--, and just the two of us remained in the alleyway.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: well, shall we
he unsheathed his blade and broke the gap between us at once.

name: asagi
normalized: --kuu!
he was incredibly swift.
but, i had made a perfect prediction of that movement.
gakin!

name: asagi
normalized: wha--
exchanging blows, i had expected to end it with a strike to the torso with my blade.
the demon's western style blade had caught the certain kill of my speed of light blade.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: what's the matter?
why are you surprised?

name: asagi
normalized: kuu…, youu
the demon had seen my speed of light blade perfectly, something that even oboro had feared.
we jostled back and forth with our blades.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: …taimanin asagi, even hell has things capable of moving at the speed of light.
i am sorry to disappoint you…

name: asagi
normalized: …we'll see about that
gah, kinn!
our blades met in perfect sync.
sparks flew from the edges clashing together.

name: asagi
normalized: （…this guy, is strong!
the reason i was called the strongest taimanin was because i could move at the speed of light.
that was a strength that i had inherited as a taimanin.
this demon that was stopping my blows unfettered was from the sort of ancient folklore that i didn't think existed.

name: asagi
normalized: kuu…uu…
the shriek of our swords meeting once again was raised.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: guku…it's my turn next!

name: asagi
normalized: wha--
i jumped back instinctively as i felt his murderous intent swell still more.
but, he filled that gap in a mere instant.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: too late!
my eyes couldn't follow him.

name: asagi
normalized: kuu!

name: asagi
normalized: （it's coming--）
i sensed his expanding intent to kill pressing towards me.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: single sword style crimson lotus flower!
eight flashes of light assailed me all at once.
but, all of them were attempts to try and behead me.
gagan!
kinn!
gakunn!
an ordinary person would not have even been able to see what was happening.
the demon's attacks and my ninja blade intersecting created tremendous sparks.
gakin!
gan!
kyunn!
my arms shook from the impacts of one heavy blow after another.
but, i had parried them perfectly.

name: asagi
normalized: （i parried them--）
i immediately tried counterattacking at the moment i fended off the killing blows.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: it's useless!
gakin!

name: asagi
normalized: nn--
again, he stopped my blade.
i had expected our blades to jostle repeatedly.
the demon's mouth curled faintly.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: that was careless…

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: guku…, you, was that your aim from the beginning!?
bakinn!
the demon's western style blade shattered.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: kuu…, you'll pay for this…
as the demon had said, it was my goal from the the start to break my opponent's blade.
i had put all my focus into doing just that when i had parried the demon's attacks.

name: asagi
normalized: hahh--!
i tore into the now weaponless demon.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: uguu…, u…
fresh blood began spurting out at once from his body that had been minced by my blade.
i had aimed at all of his vital spots, but his armor and tough muscles had hindered that.

name: asagi
normalized: （he's not fatally wounded…, but）

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: uu…, kuu…
the constant bleeding had brought him down to one knee.
it was in the moment i tried temporarily distancing myself with the demon.
something sharp flew out.

name: asagi
normalized: shit--
without time to react, it had lodged into my right thigh.

name: asagi
normalized: （it's a needle…）
whether or not it was from some illegal device, the long, narrow needle pierced into my leg.
there wasn't any blood.
but, it was a blowgun needle designed to weaken an opponent with the poisons contained in the tip.

name: asagi
normalized: chi…
i took out and cast aside the needle quickly.
i guess i hadn't thought the demon would have attacked me in this way.
i looked at the wound, but it had not changed.
what the hell kind of poisons were in it--

name: asagi
normalized: （…i don't have much time, do i）
the rendezvous with kurou was drawing near.
i wanted to finish him off, but maybe he still had something up his sleeves.
while checking to make sure that the demon didn't look to be capable of standing, i sprinted off towards the bridge.
i was worried about my back, but the demon wasn't pursuing me.
a little while later--
black smoke billowed up still from the hiding place, but there were no longer any explosions going off.
the demon slowly rose up from his knee.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: …i dislike this sort of petty drama
he grumbled holding his broken sword.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: a kindred soul.
mission accomplished…
in the blinking of an eye, his wounds had vanished.
only his broken western styled blade remained that gave any sign that there had even been a fight.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: in all seriousness…, i want to try until death
that wasn't the loser unwilling to admit defeat; it looked like he was brimming with joy of having finally found a worthy opponent.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: my damage is great… i have to take the time and recover now
he continued to speak to himself like he was talking to somebody.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: all right…
the demon set forth in the direction of the bridge.
